entry.title: There is no any black magic in computers
Hello World!
entry.content:
After the computer is powered on. The first program running is BIOS, which is
located on the ROM. BIOS will conduct hardware checks, initializes and established
interrupt vector tables.

After that, MBR(Master Boot Record) will be loaded into the memory, where CPU will
execute a jmp instruction. You guess what’s the address? Yes, that’s 0x7c00. The
reasons of 0x7c00 are diverse, but now you need konw the exciting stories begin after that.
So once you want to do something, just start it as soon as possible. You may see many different landscapes!
